mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_map(map_no, map_title, map_subtitle, map_content, map_photo, map_country, map_state, map_city, map_placett, theme_no) VALUES(#{map_no}, #{map_title}, #{map_subtitle}, #{map_content}, #{map_photo}, #{map_country}, #{map_state}, #{map_city}, #{map_placett}, #{ThemeDTO.theme_no})

INSERT INTO t_place(place_no, place_name, place_load_addr, place_addr, place_lat, place_lng, place_content, place_photo, place_course_no, map_no) VALUES(seq_place.NEXTVAL, #{place_name}, #{place_loadaddr}, #{place_addr}, #{place_lat}, #{place_lng}, #{place_content}, #{place_photo}, #{place_course_no}, #{map_no})
